Installation¶

Anaconda¶

If you do not have a working Python 3.5 or 3.6 installation, consider installing Miniconda_ (see `Installing Miniconda`_). Then run:

conda install seaborn scikit-learn statsmodels numba
conda install -c conda-forge python-igraph louvain

pip install scanpy
